name: Poradnik Uśmiechu: Chodźmy zbadać!​ (Smile Guide: Let's explore!)
name_original: Poradnik Uśmiechu: Chodźmy zbadać!​ (Smile Guide: Let's explore!)
description:
Poradnik Uśmiechu: Chodźmy zbadać! (Smile Guide: Let's explore!) is a point-and-click game about a girl named Agatha who inexplicably finds herself in the mysterious Land of Mushrooms. It is based on a Polish web series created by KrainaGrzybowTV:

https://www.youtube.com/user/krainagrzybowtv
